snippet: A U.S. soldier is among the dead in an expansion of the effort to retake Mosul, including moves by Iraqi forces and a new, village-by-village Kurdish thrust from the north....
abstract: Thousands of Kurdish fighters open up new front in battle against Islamic State forces in Mosul, to north of city, on third day of campaign to drive group out of city; Islamic State commanders appear to have expected assault as they push back aggressively against Kurdish fighters' attempts to secure 27 villages.
lead_paragraph: A U.S. soldier is among the dead in an expansion of the effort to retake Mosul, including moves by Iraqi forces and a new, village-by-village Kurdish thrust from the north.

headline.main: Kurds, Heading Into the Teeth of ISIS, Open a New Front
headline.print_headline: New Front for Kurds, Storming Into Teeth of ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
